Tieflings with a blood tie to Zariel are stronger than the typical tiefling and receive magical abilities that aid them in battle.

Ability Score Increase.Â Your Strength score increases by 1.

Legacy of Avernus. You know the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.tuiyx05mRuhMD79u]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.V26M46ELOjVDI2jq]{Searing Smite} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.SmHcPczugxpy3UXN]{Branding Smite} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
